post.text: If Trump stands by what he said about women as "locker room talk," he's clearly not sorry.

comment.author: Cassie
comment.text: "Actions speak louder than words. Mr. Trump might have said some bad words, but Bill Clinton raped me. And Hillary Clinton threatened me. I dont think there's any comparison." -Jaunita Broderick, Bill Clinton rape survivor. Hillary Clinton supporters, especially women, how utterly SHAMEFUL you are.

replies.author: Rowan
replies.text: Bill is no running and no woman supports someone that sleeps with her husband

replies.author: Cassie
replies.text: It's "not". She threatened the ladies. Hope you don't have a daughter.

replies.author: Rowan
replies.text: Cassie AND you want they grabbed and groped when they go on a white house tour

replies.author: Cassie
replies.text: Yeah and after I want to be shunned like Bill and Hillary did to those victims.
